language.description:
Adds a logo bar at the header that can be customized.
Included as part of the base bundle.

specs.title: Logo position
specs.description:
Show the logo bar at the desired position in the header.
If you want to not show it, just go to the Modules manager and disable this module.

specs.title: Background image
specs.description:
There is a background image included in this module and it is set by default.
If you want to change it, you can use the Media Manager to upload one to suit your needs.
The included background dimensions are 1920x100 pixels. If you intend to replace it, you should use one with similar size.

specs.title: Logo icon
specs.description:
The BardCanvas logo icon is included in this module and shown by default.
If you want to change it, you can use the Media Manager to upload one to suit your needs. It will be automatically adjusted to fit into the designated area.

specs.title: Icon caption
specs.description:
Type the caption you want to show next to the logo icon at the left of the bar.
If empty, it will show the contents of the engine.website_name setting.

specs.title: Site slogan
specs.description:
Type the caption you want to show at the right of the bar. You can use basic HTML to tweak formatting.
Nothing will be shown if ommited.
